descrizione: Teaching Portal of the Polytechnic University of Turin

navbar.anticipo_fine_lezione_descrizione: Today's lesson will end half an hour early.

tasse_e_agevolazioni.title: Taxes and Benefits
tasse_e_agevolazioni.description: Payment and request for tax reduction.

piano_carriera.title: Career Plan
piano_carriera.description: Completion or modification of the career plan and/or the teaching load, enrollment in the new academic year.

gestione_carriera.title: Career Management
gestione_carriera.description: Request for approval of external activities and modification of career status.

apply.title: Apply@polito
apply.description: View and check the status of your career.

laurea_ed_esame_finale.title: Degree and Final Examination
laurea_ed_esame_finale.description: View the status of the thesis and the steps to obtain the title.

proposta_di_tesi.errore_proposta_di_tesi: Error while rendering the thesis proposal
proposta_di_tesi.modal_contenuto: Are you sure you want to apply for this thesis proposal?
proposta_di_tesi.successo_content: You can check the status of your application on the page related to your thesis.
proposta_di_tesi.errore_content: An error occurred while sending the application. Please try again later.

tesi.title: Thesis
tesi.section_description: Section dedicated to managing your thesis, from the initial application to uploading the final work.
tesi.error: Error while rendering the active thesis

thesis_progress.pending_description: Your application has been correctly submitted and is under review by the supervisor. During this period, you cannot yet view the outcome or details of the evaluation. The system will send an automatic notification as soon as the evaluation procedure is completed.
thesis_progress.approved_description: Your application has been evaluated positively by the supervisor and is approved. You are now authorized to proceed with the subsequent obligations provided for in the thesis initiation process, following the timing and methods indicated by the regulations.
thesis_progress.rejected_description: The supervisor has expressed a negative opinion regarding the application submitted, which is therefore rejected. You have the opportunity to consult any reasons or additional notes entered by the supervisor by accessing the activity history section directly.
thesis_progress.cancelled_description: You have decided to withdraw this application. As a result, the thesis proposal is no longer under evaluation and cannot be considered by the supervisor. If you wish, you can submit a new application for another available thesis proposal.
thesis_progress.outcome_description: In this section, the final judgment expressed by the supervisor at the end of the evaluation phase will be displayed. The student will receive a formal communication as soon as the results are made public and available for consultation.
thesis_progress.ongoing: Your thesis is currently in progress under the supervision of the assigned supervisor.
thesis_progress.conclusion_request: Request confirmation of the thesis conclusion from the supervisor once the work is completed.
thesis_progress.almalaurea: Complete the AlmaLaurea questionnaire by the established deadline. The link to access the questionnaire will be available in this section.
thesis_progress.final_exam: Register for the final exam through this page once you have obtained confirmation of the thesis conclusion.
thesis_progress.final_thesis: Upload the final version of the thesis following the instructions provided by the supervisor and the regulations.

tesi.start_thesis_content: Are you sure you want to start your thesis? Once started, you will no longer be able to apply for other thesis proposals. This action cannot be undone.
tesi.success_thesis_started_content: You have successfully started your thesis. You can now proceed with the next steps as indicated by your supervisor.
tesi.error_thesis_started_content: An error occurred while starting the thesis. Please try again later.
tesi.success_application_cancelled_content: You can now apply for other thesis proposals.
tesi.error_application_cancelled_content: An error occurred while canceling the application. Please try again later.

modal_cancel.title: Cancel thesis
modal_cancel.body: Are you sure you want to cancel your thesis? This action cannot be undone.

information.title: Thesis information
information.line_1: Regularly check the timeline on the left to monitor the status and deadlines of your thesis.
information.line_2: Communicate promptly with your supervisor to clarify doubts and receive feedback.
information.line_3: Respect the deadlines indicated in this section and upload the required documents on time.
information.line_4: Ensure that all steps are completed before proceeding to the next step.
information.line_5: In case of technical problems, contact support through the appropriate section.

richiesta_tesi.title: Thesis Request
richiesta_tesi.success_content: The selected supervisor will be contacted to evaluate your thesis proposal.
richiesta_tesi.error_content: An error occurred while submitting the request. Please try again later.
richiesta_tesi.not_eligible_message: You are not eligible to request a thesis at this time. Please verify that you have met all the necessary requirements.
richiesta_tesi.too_long: The thesis topic exceeds the allowed character limit

modal_cancel.title: Cancel thesis
modal_cancel.body: Are you sure you want to cancel your thesis? This action cannot be undone.

page_not_found.title: Page not found
page_not_found.message: The requested page does not exist or is not available.
